name: xml-comparison
description: MCP Server for XML File Comparison - Compare XML files using StAX streaming parser with multiple output formats
author: Ravi Kalla

tools.name: compare_xml_files
tools.description: Compare two XML files using StAX streaming parser and return results in specified format (text, json, excel)

tools.name: compare_xml_files_custom_path
tools.description: Compare two XML files using StAX streaming parser and return results in specified format with custom output file path

tools.name: validate_xml_file
tools.description: Validate if a file is a well-formed XML file

tools.name: get_xml_file_info
tools.description: Get basic information about an XML file (size, element count, structure)

instructions: Run 'mvn clean package' to build the JAR
Configure Claude Desktop with the JAR path
